title: Analyzing a Sentence Structure - XP Rule - Chomsky | Linguistics
description:
This is a task presented by my teacher Valeria Roldan, where we (the students) had to analyze a sentence structure following Chomsky's XP Rule.
I hope you like it, leave a comment if you've got any advice :D
